summary: CURB VIEW ASSIST, MIRRORS AFTER BEING PROPERLY SET TO THE CURB VIEW POSITION WHILE IN REVERSE WILL FROM TIME TO TIME STAY IN THE "CURB VIEW" SETTING AFTER VEHICLE IS PLACED INTO DRIVE OR PARK. THE ONLY WAY I HAVE FOUND TO GET THEM TO COME BACK INTO DRIVING POSITION IS TO MOVE THEM USING THE MIRROR CONTROLLER OR TO TURN THE VEHICLE OFF AND THEN RESTART VEHICLE.   *NLM
